name: Localize Country select jquery plugin
tagline: Automatically localize a country select box dropdown to the users country
body:
### Localize Country select.
When showing a dropdown box on a form you can improve your user experience by preselecting the users country based on their IP addresss. This is a jquery plugin that allows you to do just that.

![View the demo here](https://cdn.rawgit.com/tenfef/localizeCountrySelect/master/index.html)

Simply include the JS file
```html
<script src="localizeCountrySelect.js"></script>
```

Then run the jquery extension on your select box
```js
$('#country_select').countryLocalizeSelect();
```


### More location based needs?
Check out IP Find [here](https://ipfind.co) and their [API documentation here](https://ipfind.co/docs)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
